ReadyPlants.desc: This tough kiln system has a comprehensive system of complete kiln shells, girth gears, pinions, tires, rollers, base frames, complete gearboxes, motors, electric panels, complete electric, and accessories for heavy-duty, continuous heavy industrial operation.

This compact vertical roller mill package is a complete grinding equipment with limers set, designed for industrial-style processing of material with very consistent performance, and very limited maintenance required.

The complete set of rotary kiln accessories includes precision-engineered shells, girth gears, pinions, tires, supporting rollers, base frames, gearboxes, motors, electric panels, full electrical systems, and essential auxiliary components, all designed for reliable performance in heavy industrial operations.

ReadyPlants.desc: The complete grinding mill package includes the girth gear, mill heads, shell, pinions, bearing housings, chromium limers, and entire base power torsion shaft (with coupling), greatly increasing the durability and reliability in steady performance.
